title: The Metaverse, NFT & Web 3.0 - Evolution of Internet
headline: Explore the role of the Metaverse in revolutionising modern communications in this free online course.
description: The Metaverse will soon revolutionise the world and the way we are connected. This course is specially designed to familiarise you with the Metaverse concept and its implications in today’s world. You will gain knowledge about the role of blockchain and non-fungible tokens (NFTs) in its various spaces. Not only that, but you will also explore the potential to enhance online retail shopping, alongside other many applications of the Metaverse.
courseDescription:
The human beings of the 21st century are witnessing a time of vast technological innovation with significant advances and inventions in all fields. One such field where we have excelled in particular is communication. With each passing day, experts and scientists are developing new ways of enhancing communication and making it easier for all. In this regard, a pioneering model of communication that needs to be mentioned is the Metaverse.

The idea of the Metaverse was first presented by Neal Stephenson in his 1992 novel ‘Snow Crash’. It refers to a virtual world where people meet and interact with each other, just like they do in the real world. This Metaverse has its own virtual economy and necessary systems to run human society. Recently, this idea was echoed worldwide after Facebook founder Mark Zuckerberg announced that his company will now be called ‘Meta’ - the concept of which is to introduce virtual worlds in the form of metaverses.  

Keeping this in mind, the course developers at Digital Partner and Alison have designed a brief and comprehensive course on this subject. It intends to explain the fundamental concepts of the Metaverse and associated technologies. You will find discussions on blockchain, NFTs and virtual reality roles in the metaverse, alongside explorations of various similar applications. It also describes the potential role in transforming the online retail experience for the retailers and the customers. Gain knowledge of the latest technological advancements by enrolling in this course today.
